md:
giải nghĩa từ "serving" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Serving (noun)
	* Meaning: The act of providing food or drink to someone.
	* Vietnamese: Dịch vụ phục vụ
	* Example sentence: The restaurant's serving staff were very friendly and attentive.
	* Related words: service, waiter, waitress

2. Serving (verb)
	* Meaning: To provide food or drink to someone.
	* Vietnamese: Phục vụ
	* Example sentence: The waiter is serving us our meals.
	* Related words: serve, food, drink

3. Serving (noun)
	* Meaning: A portion of food or drink.
	* Vietnamese: Phần ăn
	* Example sentence: The serving of cake was huge.
	* Related words: portion, dish, meal

4. Serving (verb)
	* Meaning: To fulfill a purpose or function.
	* Vietnamese: Đáp ứng
	* Example sentence: The new policy is serving its purpose well.
	* Related words: fulfill, function, purpose
html:
giải nghĩa từ "serving" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Serving (noun)

    • Meaning: The act of providing food or drink to someone.
    • Vietnamese: Dịch vụ phục vụ
    • Example sentence: The restaurant's serving staff were very friendly and attentive.
    • Related words: service, waiter, waitress

  2. Serving (verb)

    • Meaning: To provide food or drink to someone.
    • Vietnamese: Phục vụ
    • Example sentence: The waiter is serving us our meals.
    • Related words: serve, food, drink

  3. Serving (noun)

    • Meaning: A portion of food or drink.
    • Vietnamese: Phần ăn
    • Example sentence: The serving of cake was huge.
    • Related words: portion, dish, meal

  4. Serving (verb)

    • Meaning: To fulfill a purpose or function.
    • Vietnamese: Đáp ứng
    • Example sentence: The new policy is serving its purpose well.
    • Related words: fulfill, function, purpose
